long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:
A minimalist extension that makes searching for the prayer time one-click away
Has an additional time that indicates the start of the last third of the night.

Motivation:
It was narrated from Abu Hurayrah (may Allah be pleased with him) that the Messenger of Allah (blessings and peace of Allah be upon him) said: “Our Lord, may He be blessed and exalted, comes down to the lowest heaven every night when the last third of the night is left, and He says: ‘Who will call upon Me, that I may answer him? Who will ask of Me, that I may give him? Who will ask Me for forgiveness, that I may forgive him?’”

Narrated by al-Bukhaari (1145) and Muslim (758).

Options:
Right-click on the extension and select "options" to change settings.

Tech stuff:
Uses aladhan.com/prayer-times-api to GET the prayer times and to calculate the last third of the night
The last third is calculated as follows
currentDayFajr - ((currentDayFajr - previousDayMaghrib)/3)
GitHub - github.com/mohammedsahl/Last-Third

Release info:
-------------------

1.0.0
Initial release


If you would like to provide feedback, report bugs or send dua's please email sahl.kably@gmail.com

Jazakallah Khair, wa Salaam alaikumu wa Rahmatullahi wa Barakatuhu
